title: How to Make 3 Step Beef Gravy

steps.headline: Take any beef drippings(optional) and bring them to a boil with 1 cup of water and 1 tsp of beef base.
Mix 1 C of cold water with 3 tablespoon (44.4 ml) of flour, then add to the boiling beef stock while slowly stirring.
Heat on low until desired consistency is achieved.

text: Take any beef drippings(optional) and bring them to a boil with 1 cup of water and 1 tsp of beef base.  Mix 1 C of cold water with 3 tablespoon (44.4 ml) of flour, then add to the boiling beef stock while slowly stirring.  Heat on low until desired consistency is achieved.  Finished.
